name: Kobecoin
description: Kobecoin is more than a meme token — it’s a mission of love and purpose. Inspired by Kobe, a loyal companion whose story lives on, this token was created to honor his memory and bring hope to others. Kobecoin was created with heart — inspired by the bond we share with our pets and the belief that compassion can bring people together. Our long-term vision includes supporting dog shelters, helping pet owners, and building future utilities such as NFTs, games, and the upcoming Pawsitive Reunion platform. Every holder becomes part of a community that understands how small actions can create meaningful change. Kobecoin blends creativity, purpose, and community spirit into a movement that aims to make a real difference.
